#SmcBar_GCMLW
# A(x)/A(V) for x = 1/wave(in microns), from Gordon et al. (2003, ApJ, 594, 279)
# SMC Bar
#1/um	A_x/A_V
1.e-9	0.000	
0.455	0.016	
0.606	0.169	
0.800	0.131	
1.235	0.567	
1.538	0.801	
1.818	1.000
